item.title: How Web Works
item.description: Basic Concepts Category Name Explanation Network VPC Virtual Private Cloud Virtual Private Cloud. Why Virtual Private? It is a collection of resources that run on a public cloud, isolating a portion of the public cloud resources for a particular user, and giving that user private access to resources that feel like they are using their own private cloud. What is a cloud? A virtualized network built on top of a physical one, VPCs use tunneling technology to isolate the virtual network.
